      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>

    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oai</catalog>
            <entry>oai:melt.cup.cam.ac.uk:cahi1:data_113261</entry>
          </identifier>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>lre</catalog>
            <entry>cahi1:data_113261</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Methane ignition - a self-sustained reaction</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Methanzündung - eine Selbst-unterstützte 
Reaktion</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Inflammation du grisou - une réaction de 
art de l'auto-portrait-sustained</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Ignição de methane - uma reação 
self-sustentada</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Accensione di metano - una reazione 
auto-continua</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ανάφλεξη μεθανίου - μια αυτόνομη αντίδραση</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Ignición de metano - una reacción uno 
mismo-sostenida</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This illustration shows the ignition of methane as an exothermic reaction. No reaction occurs between oxygen and methane before ignition thus the reaction is self-sustained.</string>
          </description>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Energy</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">exothermic reaction</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">ignition</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">methane</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">oxygen</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">spontaneous repulsion</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Diese Abbildung zeigt die Zündung des Methans 
als exotherme Reaktion. Keine Reaktion tritt zwischen Sauerstoff
und Methan auf, bevor Zündung folglich die Reaktion 
Selbst-unterstützt wird.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Cette illustration montre l'allumage du méthane 
comme réaction exothermique. Aucune réaction ne se produit 
entre l'oxygène et le méthane avant que l'allumage la réaction soit
ainsi art de l'auto-portrait-sustained.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Esta ilustração mostra a ignição do methane 
como uma reação exothermic. Nenhuma reação ocorre entre o 
oxigênio e o methane antes que a ignição a reação self-esteja 
sustentada assim.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questa illustrazione mostra l'accensione di 
metano come reazione esotermica. Nessuna reazione si presenta 
fra ossigeno e metano prima che l'accensione la reazione auto-sia 
sostenuta così.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτή η απεικόνιση εμφανίζει την ανάφλεξη του μεθανίου
ως εξωθερμική αντίδραση. Καμία αντίδραση δεν εμφανίζεται 
μεταξύ του οξυγόνου και του μεθανίου πριν από την ανάφλεξη έτσι 
που η αντίδραση είναι αυτόνομη.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Esta ilustración muestra la ignición del metano
como reacción exotérmica. Ninguna reacción ocurre entre el 
oxígeno y el metano antes de que la ignición la reacción uno 
mismo-se sostenga así.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Energie</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">exotherme Reaktion</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Zündung</string>
          </keyword>

          </keyword>
